overview:
Vialectâ€™s mission is to help companies improve productivity and achieve business objectives by offering a corporate social networking suite with traditional collaborative application that we call Noodle.

Our priorities

It is our top priority to help your company work efficiently and collaborate effectively. These goals drive every feature we develop for our software. Everything we create must be intuitive, simple, and provide value to your company. Noodle aims to be the central knowledge repository for any corporation that can capitalize on the use of stored information.

Problem we solve Companies are currently relying on email, file servers and static web pages for information sharing. Email is becoming less valuable with the current volume of spam, file servers only hold a single information type and static web pages become outdated quickly. Having multiple locations and methods only hinder effective collaboration and ultimately cost the enterprise by having users waste time searching for the information they need or even worse using the wrong information to complete tasks.

What makes us unique We believe strongly that its people that drive businesses. Noodle is designed with people in mind and it provides the tools that allows those people to contribute to important initiatives within the business.

With the most flexible deployment options in the industry - including software as a service, traditional software and dedicates servers we can fulfill any client deployment preference.

We have been building, deploying and supporting web software for over 5 years and its that experience that allows us to provide value to our clients.

Our clients Our customers are the most important aspect to our business. They are not dependent on us. We are dependent on them. They are not an interruption in our work - they are the purpose of it.

Our clients range from small 5 user groups to 5000 employee enterprises. Today, many organizations use Vialect, including Sapient, Credit Union for Central Ontario, United Nations, University of Maryland, University of Pittsburgh, Baja Fresh Mexican Grill, Coldwell Banker Schmidt, OKI Semiconductors, Universal Studios, Houston Grand Opera, Johnson & Johnson Medical, among others.
